text.author: H.P. Lovecraft
text.title: What the Moon Brings
text.summary: A protagonist tells of a terrifying walk on a moonlit summer night into a stream flowing to an ocean filled with the dead, during which face-like lotos blossoms whispered to him and a dead city of spires appeared in the sea, where sea worms feasted on flesh under an evil moon and a shocking statue with hooves and a crown gazed at him.
